customers_dim: CREATE TABLE customers_dim (customer_id VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY,customer_unique_id VARCHAR(255),customer_zip_code_prefix VARCHAR(255),customer_city VARCHAR(255),customer_state VARCHAR(255));
sellers_dim: CREATE TABLE sellers_dim (seller_id VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY,seller_zip_code_prefix VARCHAR(255),seller_city VARCHAR(255),seller_state VARCHAR(255));
products_dim: CREATE TABLE products_dim (product_id VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY,product_category_name VARCHAR(255),product_name_length VARCHAR(255),product_description_length VARCHAR(255),product_photos_qty VARCHAR(255),product_weight_g DECIMAL(10, 2),product_length_cm DECIMAL(10, 2),product_height_cm DECIMAL(10, 2),product_width_cm DECIMAL(10, 2));
orders_fact: CREATE TABLE orders_fact (order_id VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY,customer_id VARCHAR(255),product_id VARCHAR(255),seller_id VARCHAR(255),price DECIMAL(10, 2),freight_value DECIMAL(10, 2),payment_value DECIMAL(10, 2),review_score DECIMAL(3, 2),order_item_count VARCHAR(255),FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers_dim(customer_id),FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products_dim(product_id),FOREIGN KEY (seller_id) REFERENCES sellers_dim(seller_id));
reviews_dim: CREATE TABLE reviews_dim (order_id VARCHAR(255),review_id VARCHAR(255),review_comment_title VARCHAR(255),review_comment_message TEXT,review_creation_date DATE,review_answer_timestamp TIMESTAMP,FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES orders_fact(order_id));
payments_dim: CREATE TABLE payments_dim (order_id VARCHAR(255),payment_sequential VARCHAR(255),payment_type VARCHAR(50),payment_installments VARCHAR(255),FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES orders_fact(order_id));
order_status_dim:: CREATE TABLE order_status_dim (order_id VARCHAR(255),order_status VARCHAR(50),order_purchase_timestamp TIMESTAMP,order_approved_at TIMESTAMP,order_delivered_carrier_date TIMESTAMP,order_delivered_customer_date TIMESTAMP,order_estimated_delivery_date TIMESTAMP,FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES orders_fact(order_id));
